owner.description: Owner must be a valid address

amount.description: Using repeated cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin with the annotation (gogoproto.castrepeated) = "github.com/cosmos/cosmos-sdk/types.Coins" so that the generated Go code will have `Amount sdk.Coins` automatically.

MsgMintCoins.title: Msg Mint Coins
MsgMintCoins.description: MsgMintCoins mints coins into the owner's balance, as long as each coin's "root name" is owned by that owner.

cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.title: Coin
cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.description: Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount. NOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method signatures required by gogoproto.
